hero.headline:
Track your subscriptions
down!
hero.subtitle: A subscription manager that respects your privacy. All data stays on your device. Available on iOS.

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: Powerful features that put you in control

addAny.title: Any Subscription
addAny.description: Add any subscription manually, from a receipt, or a screenshot. Streaming, cloud, gym, insurance — if it recurs, it belongs here.

calendar.title: Calendar & List View
calendar.description: See every upcoming and past transaction at a glance. Switch between a clear list and a visual calendar to plan ahead.

library.title: Your Library
library.description: Services, categories, payment methods — all editable. Start with 80+ built-in presets or create your own. Everything adapts to how you organize things.

cycles.title: Any Billing Cycle
cycles.description: Monthly, annual, weekly, or a custom period. Set trial end dates so you never forget to cancel before you're charged.

spending.title: Spending at a Glance
spending.description: See your total monthly and annual cost instantly. Breakdown by category shows where the money goes.

reminders.title: Renewal Alerts
reminders.description: Get notified before you're charged. Choose when — a day, a week, or a custom window. Never pay for something you meant to cancel.

privacy.title: Your data stays on your device
privacy.subtitle: Uha doesn't have accounts, servers, or analytics. There is nothing to leak because we never collect anything.

noAccounts.title: No Accounts or Sign-Ups
noAccounts.description: Open the app and start using it. No email, no password, no registration wall. Your identity is not our business.

noTracking.title: No Analytics or Tracking
noTracking.description: Zero telemetry, zero crash reporters, zero third-party SDKs that phone home. We don't know how you use the app — and we like it that way.

faceId.title: Face ID & Passcode Lock
faceId.description: Protect your financial data with biometric authentication. Even if someone picks up your phone, your subscriptions stay hidden.

rates.title: Exchange Rates — the Only Request
rates.description: The sole network call Uha makes is to fetch currency exchange rates. No personal data is sent — just a date. Your subscriptions never leave the device.

icloud.title: Optional iCloud Backup
icloud.description: You can back up your data to your personal iCloud — encrypted by Apple, controlled by you. It's opt-in, and we never see it.

export.title: Your Data, Your Format
export.description: Export everything as CSV or SQL at any time. Full access to your own data, no lock-in, no hoops to jump through.

privacy.statement: We built Uha for people who believe privacy isn't a feature — it's a right.

aiFeature.title: Works with Apple Intelligence
aiFeature.subtitle: On supported devices, Uha uses on-device machine learning to save you time on the boring stuff.

scanFill.title: Scan a Receipt or Screenshot
scanFill.description: Point your camera at a receipt or share a screenshot. On-device text recognition extracts the service name, price, and renewal date so you don't type it in manually.

naturalInput.title: Just Type It
naturalInput.description: Write "netflix 799 monthly" in one field and Uha parses it into a name, price, and billing cycle. No need to fill out three separate fields.

smartReminders.title: Smarter Reminder Timing
smartReminders.description: Instead of a fixed "3 days before", the app picks a better moment to notify you — based on the subscription type and how much time you'd need to act.

autoCategorize.title: Auto-Categorize
autoCategorize.description: When you add a subscription, Uha recognizes the service and suggests a category, icon, and typical pricing. Less manual setup, fewer mistakes.

duplicates.title: Overlap Detection
duplicates.description: "You already have Apple One, which includes Apple Music." Uha flags duplicate and bundled services so you don't pay twice for the same thing.

spendingSummary.title: Spending Summary
spendingSummary.description: A single sentence like "This month you'll spend 12% more because of the annual Figma renewal." Generated from your data, nothing more.

aiFeature.premium: Premium feature · Requires iPhone 15 Pro or later
aiFeature.onDeviceNote: Powered by on-device frameworks. Capabilities depend on device model and iOS version.

customization.title: Make it yours
customization.subtitle: Every detail adapts to how you use it

appIcon.title: Express Yourself
appIcon.description: Choose from classic, dark, and pride icons. Your home screen, your identity.

themes.title: Light, Dark & OLED
themes.description: Three distinct themes that follow your system preference or can be set independently. OLED mode with true blacks for displays that support it.

accentColor.title: Your Accent, Your Mood
accentColor.description: Pick an accent color that sets the tone for the entire interface — buttons, highlights, charts. One tap to make the app feel like it was made just for you.

baseCurrency.title: See Everything in Your Currency
baseCurrency.description: Set your home currency and Uha converts every subscription to it automatically. Track in dollars, pay in euros, see totals in yen — all at once with live exchange rates.

pricing.title: Simple pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start for free, upgrade when you need more

docs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using Uha

gettingStarted.intro: Uha is a subscription manager for iOS that keeps all your data on your device. No accounts, no sign-ups — just open the app and start tracking.
gettingStarted.step1: Download Uha from the App Store and open it.
gettingStarted.step2: Tap "+" to add your first subscription — manually, from a receipt, or a screenshot.
gettingStarted.step3: Set a reminder so you never miss a renewal date.
gettingStarted.tip: Uha comes with 80+ built-in service presets. Start typing a service name and it will auto-suggest the details.

adding.intro: There are several ways to add a subscription to Uha:
adding.manualDesc: Fill in the name, price, billing cycle, and category. Pick from presets or create a custom service.
adding.receiptDesc: Point your camera at a paper or digital receipt. On-device text recognition will extract the details automatically.
adding.screenshotDesc: Share a screenshot of a confirmation email or billing page with Uha, and it will parse the subscription info.
adding.naturalDesc: Type something like "Netflix 15.99 monthly" into a single field and Uha will parse it into separate fields.
adding.tip: Receipt and screenshot scanning, as well as natural language input, use on-device ML — your data never leaves the device.

managing.intro: Once you've added subscriptions, Uha gives you two ways to view and manage them:
managing.calendarDesc: See upcoming renewals on a visual calendar. Great for planning when charges will hit.
managing.listDesc: A chronological list of all your subscriptions with prices and next renewal dates.
managing.categoriesDesc: Organize subscriptions into categories like Streaming, Productivity, Health, etc. Fully customizable.
managing.editDesc: Tap any subscription to update the price, cycle, category, or cancel it entirely.

spending.intro: Uha gives you a clear picture of where your money goes:
spending.monthly: Monthly total — see how much you're spending each month across all subscriptions.
spending.annual: Annual total — the full yearly cost at a glance.
spending.category: Category breakdown — visual split of spending by category.
spending.forecast: Forecast — project your spending up to 3 years ahead (10 years with Unlimited).

reminders.intro: Never pay for something you meant to cancel. Set up renewal alerts:
reminders.step2: Choose when to be notified: 1 day before, 3 days, 1 week, or a custom interval.
reminders.step3: You'll receive a local notification — no server needed.
reminders.tip: With AI features enabled, Uha can suggest smarter reminder timing based on the subscription type.

privacy.intro: Uha is built with privacy at its core. Here's what that means in practice:
privacy.noAccount: No accounts or sign-ups — open and use. Your identity is not our business.
privacy.noTracking: Zero analytics, telemetry, crash reporters, or third-party SDKs.
privacy.faceId: Protect the app with Face ID or a passcode — your data stays hidden even if someone picks up your phone.
privacy.network: The only network request Uha makes is to fetch currency exchange rates. Only a date is sent — no personal data.
privacy.statement: We believe privacy isn't a feature — it's a right. Uha is built for people who agree.

ai.intro: On supported devices (iPhone 15 Pro+), Uha uses on-device machine learning to make things faster:
ai.scanDesc: Extracts service name, price, and renewal date using on-device text recognition.
ai.nlpDesc: Write "Spotify 9.99 monthly" in one field — Uha parses it into structured data.
ai.categorizeDesc: Recognizes the service and suggests a category, icon, and typical pricing.
ai.duplicatesDesc: Flags duplicate services or ones already included in a bundle you have.
ai.summaryDesc: A sentence like "This month you'll spend 12% more because of the annual Figma renewal."
ai.tip: All AI features run entirely on your device. Nothing is sent to any server.

customization.intro: Make Uha feel like it was made just for you:
customization.iconsDesc: Choose from classic, dark, and pride icon variants for your home screen.
customization.themesDesc: Light, Dark, and OLED modes. Follows system preference or set independently.
customization.accentDesc: Pick from 8 iOS-inspired accent colors that style the entire interface.
customization.currencyDesc: Set your home currency and all subscriptions are automatically converted with live exchange rates.

export.intro: Your data belongs to you. Export it anytime in two formats:
export.csv: Opens in any spreadsheet app. Great for personal analysis or sharing.
export.sql: A database dump you can import into any SQL-compatible tool.
export.step3: Share or save the file via the iOS share sheet.

icloud.intro: Uha supports optional iCloud backup. Your data is encrypted by Apple and controlled by you.
icloud.step3: Your data will sync across devices signed into the same Apple ID.
icloud.tip: iCloud backup is entirely opt-in. Uha never sees or accesses your iCloud data.

faq.a1: Yes. The free plan includes up to 5 subscriptions, 3 currencies, and a 3-year forecast. Upgrade to Unlimited to remove all limits.
faq.a2: Yes. Everything works offline except currency exchange rate updates, which require a brief network request.
faq.q3: Can I use Uha on iPad or Mac?
faq.a3: iPadOS and macOS versions are coming soon. Currently Uha is available on iPhone.
faq.q4: What happens if I delete the app?
faq.a4: All data is stored locally on your device. If you delete the app without an iCloud backup, your data is gone. We recommend enabling iCloud sync or exporting regularly.
faq.a5: Yes. Uha is open source — you can inspect the code and verify that your data stays private.
